DataSet.Name: AmbientType
DataSet.Description: type of sound ambient

DataSet.Name: AssetCategory
DataSet.Description: Defines the type / category of an asset

DataSet.Name: BuildableType
DataSet.Description: Rückgabewerte von CheckPosition (woran ist Checkposition gescheitert - Testtext)

DataSet.Name: BuildingType
DataSet.Description: every building has a building type. Islandmanager has lists of buildings with same buildingtype.

DataSet.Name: Category
DataSet.Description: Ware and Building demand categories

DataSet.Name: Clime
DataSet.Description: clime zones

Item.Name: Scheich
Item.Description: 1000 Geld, 1t Werkzeug, 1t Holz, 1t Nahrung und auf das selektierte Schiff Baumaterial für ein Kontor

Item.Name: Buildmaterial
Item.Description: Warenhaus der aktuellen Insel mit Baumaterial füllen

DataSet.Name: EcoEffectType
DataSet.Description: Source type of effect on ecobalance

Item.Name: TycoonEcobalanceBuilding
Item.Description: positive effects that are capped by 0

Item.Name: Item
Item.Description: zum Abfragen von Bonuseffekten durch Items

DataSet.Name: Effect
DataSet.Description: über ABL startbare Effekte

DataSet.Name: EnvironmentalState
DataSet.Description: Subdivisions of Ecobalance

Item.Name: Wildcard
Item.Description: This fertility can be replaced by seed items

DataSet.Name: ForceBlockingUpdateType
DataSet.Description: Forces BlockingUpdate for Pathfreeing

DataSet.Name: GameVersion
DataSet.Description: Versions of the Game (Beta, Demo, Retail, Addon)

Item.Name: CleanUp
Item.Description: Wake up a script to perform cleanup operations

DataSet.Name: GrowType
DataSet.Description: Wie wächst ein Objekt

Item.Name: AttackableByHumansOnly
Item.Description: handle may only be attacked by human players

Item.Name: IsRelocating
Item.Description: Carrier is on its way to relocate this handle

Item.Name: IsControlledByFeedbackSystem
Item.Description: The FeedbackSystem controls the movement of this unit

Item.Name: Production
Item.Description: Build radius of Kontor and Markethouse

DataSet.Name: InfoLayerType
DataSet.Description: Priority for Infolayer icons, 0 is highest prio

Item.Name: IslandStorageFull
Item.Description: Produktion gestoppt, da Insellager und internes Lager voll sind

Item.Name: PickupMissing
Item.Description: wird für Endwarebetriebe bei vollem internen Lager angezeigt

Item.Name: BuildmaterialBlocked
Item.Description: Marktplätze zeigen das an, wenn Baumaterial gesperrt wurde

Item.Name: MapIsland
Item.Description: player ship is mapping an island for a mapquest

Item.Name: ShipWhiteFlag
Item.Description: Schiff benutzt das Item White Flag

Item.Name: RepairObject
Item.Description: object able to repair player vehicles

DataSet.Name: IntermediateLevel
DataSet.Description: Level and ResidentCount are configured in PropertyBalancing

DataSet.Name: MaintenanceType
DataSet.Description: Art der Unterhaltskosten

DataSet.Name: MatchingClime
DataSet.Description: Which clime is matching

DataSet.Name: MoraleBlocker
DataSet.Description: Welche Effekte führen zu einer eingeschränkten Zufriedenheit

Item.Name: MinePath
Item.Description: Pfad zu höhergelegenen Minen, jede zweite Variation zeigt den bebauten Zustand

DataSet.Name: NoriaTextures
DataSet.Description: Wird zum Konfigurieren der Noria benutzt

Item.Name: MissileLauncherArmed
Item.Description: used to check whether a missile launcher was armed

DataSet.Name: ObjectPlacement
DataSet.Description: Wie wird das Objekt gesetzt

DataSet.Name: PayableType
DataSet.Description: Mögliche Gründe, warum etwas nicht bezahlt werden kann.

DataSet.Name: PlayerResource
DataSet.Description: globale Resourcen wie Geld

DataSet.Name: Productivity
DataSet.Description: Describe the proctivity on islands with the special Fertility

DataSet.Name: ProgressLevel
DataSet.Description: player progress by special intermedite levels

DataSet.Name: ResidentLevel
DataSet.Description: Zivilisationsstufen

DataSet.Name: ResidentSatisfaction
DataSet.Description: Zufriedenheit der Einwohner

Item.Name: Escort
Item.Description: Schiff eskortiert gerade ein anderes Schiff

Item.Name: StrictTimetable
Item.Description: (default) Ships perform the set actions at harbours as closely as possible and move on to the next route station

Item.Name: ExactTrade
Item.Description: Ships stay in port until they completed all of the set actions exactly as desired, e.g. they wait for a storage slot to be filled before continueing

Item.Name: OneShot
Item.Description: Ships on this route follow it in exact order from first to last station, even if the first station is not nearest to them. After performing this route once, any assigned ship is automatically pasued and remains near the last station

Item.Name: Lost
Item.Description: how many times the player has lost an object

Item.Name: Destroyed
Item.Description: how many times the player has destroyed a foreign object of this type

Item.Name: Exploded
Item.Description: how many times this asset was exploded because of a disaster

Item.Name: DisasterImpact
Item.Description: how many times this asset has started a disaster

Item.Name: DisasterComponentStarted
Item.Description: how many times this disaster component was started for the player

Item.Name: MissionPlayingTime
Item.Description: how many minutes the player has played this mission

Item.Name: MissionSolvedMinTime
Item.Description: minimum time needed to solve a mission(in minutes)

Item.Name: DestroyedByEnemy
Item.Description: how many times this object was destroyed by an enemy

Item.Name: ItemCreated
Item.Description: An item was created from a building

Item.Name: EcoBalance
Item.Description: current eco balance of this island

Item.Name: Shares
Item.Description: shares the player owns on the island

Item.Name: TechLevel2Residents
Item.Description: number of residents with tech level 2

Item.Name: HasEnoughFarmfields
Item.Description: Checks if the farm has enough farmfields

Item.Name: IsProducing
Item.Description: Checks if the factory is producing

Item.Name: QuestGained
Item.Description: the player has got a quest

Item.Name: StatusQuestGained
Item.Description: the player has got a status quest

Item.Name: RelationQuestGained
Item.Description: the player has got a relation quest

DataSet.Name: PlayerCounter
DataSet.Description: global counter for player actions

Item.Name: DamagedVehicles
Item.Description: number of vehicles damaged at the moment

Item.Name: DamagedHouses
Item.Description: number of houses damaged at the moment

Item.Name: TreesBuilt
Item.Description: how many trees the player has built

Item.Name: StreetsBuilt
Item.Description: hoy many streets the player has built

Item.Name: EcoResidentBuildings
Item.Description: amount of eco resident buildings the player owns

Item.Name: TycoonResidentBuildings
Item.Description: amount of tycoon resident buildings the player owns

Item.Name: TechResidentBuildings
Item.Description: amount of tech resident buildings the player owns

Item.Name: DiplomacyActionsUsed
Item.Description: how many times a player has used a diplomacy action. Using the same action again increases the counter too

Item.Name: TradeAmount
Item.Description: how much credits spent for trading

Item.Name: ContinuousGamesStarted
Item.Description: how many continuous games the player has started

Item.Name: ContinuousGamesCompleted
Item.Description: how many times the player has completed a continuous game

Item.Name: ItemsUsed
Item.Description: how many times the player has used an item

Item.Name: BuildingsBuilt
Item.Description: How many buildings the player has built. Lost buildings dont decrease this value

Item.Name: FinalGoodsProduced
Item.Description: number of final goods produced (IMPORTANT : in kg)

Item.Name: EcoMaxLevelResidents
Item.Description: resident count of the last eco level

Item.Name: TycoonMaxLevelResidents
Item.Description: resident count of the last tycoon level

Item.Name: TechLevel2Residents
Item.Description: resident count of the last tech level

Item.Name: BuildingsTakenOver
Item.Description: how many buildings the player has taken over

Item.Name: WarDeclared
Item.Description: how many times the player has declared war

Item.Name: MobileBuildingsReplaced
Item.Description: how many times the player has replaced a mobile building

Item.Name: MaxOrnamentalBuildingsOnIsland
Item.Description: max amount of ornamental buildings on one island

Item.Name: ColonizedUnderwaterIslands
Item.Description: number of underwater islands where the player has at least a kontor

Item.Name: UsedDivingAction
Item.Description: how many times the player has dived

Item.Name: EnergyProduced
Item.Description: how many energy the player produces at the moment

Item.Name: EcoBalanceIncreased
Item.Description: By how many points the player has increased the eco balance at the moment(only positive objects count)

Item.Name: EcoBalanceDecreased
Item.Description: By how many points the player has decreased the eco balance at the moment(only negative objects count)

Item.Name: DiscoveredUnderwaterIslands
Item.Description: Underwater islands the player has discovered

Item.Name: TradeIncome
Item.Description: total income from all trade actions

Item.Name: TradeExpense
Item.Description: total expense from all trade action

Item.Name: TradeBalance
Item.Description: Total income - expanese from all trade actions

Item.Name: StartedWithEcos
Item.Description: how many times the player has started with the eco faction

Item.Name: StartedWithTycoons
Item.Description: how many times the player has started with the tycoon faction

Item.Name: DiplomacyPointsSpent
Item.Description: Diplomacy points the player has spent for diplomacy actions

Item.Name: DestroyedMilitaryPoints
Item.Description: amount of military points the player has destroyed(Sum of all military points from destroyed vehicles)

Item.Name: MaxLevelResidents
Item.Description: number of residents of the highest level(Tyccon4 + Eco4 + Tech2)

Item.Name: ResourcesCollected
Item.Description: resources the player has collected (in kg!)

Item.Name: OwningIslandPercentage
Item.Description: percentage of islands the player owns. A player owns every island where no other player has a settlement

Item.Name: UsedImport
Item.Description: how many times the player has used the import function

Item.Name: ChangedMediaChannel
Item.Description: who many times the player has changed a media channel

Item.Name: DiscoveredPlayers
Item.Description: amount of players the player has discovered

Item.Name: ModulesCreated
Item.Description: modules the player has created in a laboratory

Item.Name: DevsCreated
Item.Description: devs the player has created in an academy

Item.Name: WorldPatronActionsUsed
Item.Description: amount of world patron actions the player has used

Item.Name: ArkGoodsOrdered
Item.Description: amount of goods the player has ordered in the ark

Item.Name: VehiclesBought
Item.Description: vehicles bought using the vehicle trade

Item.Name: DiplomacyPointsGained
Item.Description: diplomacy points the player has gained by positive actions

Item.Name: TimeForTycoonLevel1
Item.Description: time needed to reach tyccon level 1(in seconds). has a negative value when the level was not reached

Item.Name: TimeForTycoonLevel2
Item.Description: time needed to reach tyccon level 2(in seconds). has a negative value when the level was not reached

Item.Name: TimeForTycoonLevel3
Item.Description: time needed to reach tyccon level 3(in seconds). has a negative value when the level was not reached

Item.Name: TimeForTycoonLevel4
Item.Description: time needed to reach tyccon level 4(in seconds). has a negative value when the level was not reached

Item.Name: TimeForEcoLevel1
Item.Description: time needed to reach eco level 1(in seconds). has a negative value when the level was not reached

Item.Name: TimeForEcoLevel2
Item.Description: time needed to reach eco level 2(in seconds). has a negative value when the level was not reached

Item.Name: TimeForEcoLevel3
Item.Description: time needed to reach eco level 3(in seconds). has a negative value when the level was not reached

Item.Name: TimeForEcoLevel4
Item.Description: time needed to reach eco level 4(in seconds). has a negative value when the level was not reached

Item.Name: TimeForTechsLevel1
Item.Description: time needed to reach tech level 1(in seconds). has a negative value when the level was not reached

Item.Name: TimeForTechsLevel2
Item.Description: time needed to reach tech level 2(in seconds). has a negative value when the level was not reached

Item.Name: GamePaused
Item.Description: how many times the player has paused the game

Item.Name: UsedHijackerItem
Item.Description: how many times the player has used a hijacker item

Item.Name: UsedHijackerStealItem
Item.Description: how many times the player has used a hijacker steal item

Item.Name: MissionsStartedEasy
Item.Description: how many mission started with the easy difficulty

Item.Name: MissionsStartedMedium
Item.Description: how many mission started with the medium difficulty

Item.Name: MissionsStartedHard
Item.Description: how many mission started with the hard difficulty

Item.Name: FormulasDiscovered
Item.Description: how many formulas the player has discovered

Item.Name: MilitaryPointsUsed
Item.Description: how many military points the player currently uses

Item.Name: UsedDetonatorItems
Item.Description: how many times the player has used a detonator item

Item.Name: UsedDisasterControlItems
Item.Description: how many times the player has used a disaster control item

Item.Name: UsedEMPItems
Item.Description: how many times the player has used an EMP item

Item.Name: UsedExpeditionItems
Item.Description: how many times the player has used an expedition item

Item.Name: UsedLetterOfMarqueItems
Item.Description: how many times the player has used a letter of marque item

Item.Name: UsedResourceFillItems
Item.Description: how many times the player has used a resource fill item

Item.Name: UsedSeedItems
Item.Description: how many times the player has used a seed item

Item.Name: UsedShieldItems
Item.Description: how many times the player has used the shield item

Item.Name: UsedStealthItems
Item.Description: how many times the player has used the stealth item

Item.Name: UsedTollWaresItems
Item.Description: how many times the player has used the toll wares item

Item.Name: UsedWhiteFlagItems
Item.Description: how many times the player has used the white flag item

Item.Name: SupportFleetUsed
Item.Description: any kind of support fleet used

Item.Name: ThirdPartyWaresBought
Item.Description: amount of wares bought from third parties (in tons) using the active trade

Item.Name: ThirdPartyWaresSold
Item.Description: amount of wares sold to third parties (in tons) using the active trade

Item.Name: ItemsBought
Item.Description: amount of items the player has bought

Item.Name: VehiclesBuilt
Item.Description: how many vehicles the player has built

Item.Name: UsedArkItemSlots
Item.Description: how many ark item slots are currently in use

Item.Name: AverageEcoBalance
Item.Description: average eco balance on all player islands (-100 to +100)

Item.Name: MissionPointRank
Item.Description: current rank between all human player compared by the mission points, starting with 1

Item.Name: MaxAirportSlotsUsed
Item.Description: maximum number of airport slots used in a single airport

Item.Name: VehiclesLost
Item.Description: how many vehicles the player has lost

Item.Name: LastMinuteQuestsSolved
Item.Description: quest solved in the last 10 seconds before the quest time was over

Item.Name: QuestLicensesGot
Item.Description: licenses the player has got for solving quests

Item.Name: ItemValueCreated
Item.Description: value of created items, i.e. item cost of created items

Item.Name: TimeForTechsLevel3
Item.Description: time needed to reach tech level 3 (in seconds). has a negative value when the level was not reached

Item.Name: TradeAmount
Item.Description: Credits and licence amount traded with this profile

Item.Name: ItemsSold
Item.Description: how many items the player has sold to this profile

Item.Name: DiplomacyPoints
Item.Description: current diplomacy points the player has for this player

Item.Name: CharacterKilled
Item.Description: how many times this profile was killed. Stored for the base profile only!

DataSet.Name: QuestCondition
DataSet.Description: Spezielle Bedingungen eines Spielers für Quests

Item.Name: Default
Item.Description: The default execution place configured in the AI profile will be used

Item.Name: AlwaysCheckPreconditions
Item.Description: when set the quest checks the preconditions while the quest is running. The quest fails when the preconditions are not reached

Item.Name: NoSelectInvitation
Item.Description: When set no invitation is triggered when selecting the quest object

Item.Name: ForceReminder
Item.Description: When set the quest has an reminder even if the quest arrow is hidden

Item.Name: HelperQuest
Item.Description: special helper quests which can be turned off

Item.Name: DefeatQuest
Item.Description: the character is defeated but stays in the world

DataSet.Name: RewardAmount
DataSet.Description: category of product amount for rewards

DataSet.Name: FeedbackBuildingState
DataSet.Description: flags to check if a building is currently occupied by a special feedback event

DataSet.Name: FeedbackEvent
DataSet.Description: feedbacks

DataSet.Name: UnitFlag
DataSet.Description: Unit flags for ffedback units

DataSet.Name: AudioPriority
DataSet.Description: priority categories for sounds

Item.Name: SwapGUIDS
Item.Description: If set FromGUID and ToGUID will be swapped by a 50/50 chance.

Item.Name: GlobalEnemy
Item.Description: used for objects that can be attacked from all players

Item.Name: DisableTrade
Item.Description: trading with this player is not allowed

Item.Name: DisableAirshipAttack
Item.Description: when set the player may not attack the other player with airships anymore

DataSet.Name: PlayerFunction
DataSet.Description: functions a player can execute

DataSet.Name: PlayerState
DataSet.Description: possible states between two players, used for quests

Item.Name: HUMANISLANDCOUNT
Item.Description: Maximum numbers of the human colonized island per player

Item.Name: TRANSPORTERCOUNT
Item.Description: Count how often the transporter leaves the world

Item.Name: ALLCOMPLETE
Item.Description: All other island are fullfilled, buildup is complete

Item.Name: ASKHUMANPLAYER
Item.Description: Ask the human player to increment the progress cathegory.

Item.Name: IncreaseReputation
Item.Description: Increase the diplomacy point generation rate by the ReactionValue

Item.Name: DecreaseReputation
Item.Description: Decrease the diplomacy point generation rate by the ReactionValue

Item.Name: EnableShipTrade
Item.Description: Ship trade is enabled by now

Item.Name: DisableShipTrade
Item.Description: Ship trade is disabled by now

Item.Name: SetPeace
Item.Description: Sets the current treaty to peace

Item.Name: EnableProductionArea
Item.Description: Enables the production area from the AI profile with the specified index(0 is the first one)

Item.Name: DisableProductionArea
Item.Description: Disables the production area from the AI profile with the specified index(0 is the first one)

Item.Name: ACTIVE_TRADE_CANCELLED
Item.Description: Spieler hat nicht mit Händler gehandelt

Item.Name: RETREAT
Item.Description: The AI or a player gives up

Item.Name: ATTACK_UNIT
Item.Description: Einheit/Gebäude wird angegriffen. Wenn ein Objekt eingestellt ist wird die Meldung nur getriggert wenn dieses Objekt angegriffen wurde

Item.Name: HELP_ENEMY_UNIT_KILLED
Item.Description: Spieler hat gegnerische Einheit während Hilferuf getötet

Item.Name: ICEAGE_RUNNING
Item.Description: thirdparty selected while in ice age

Item.Name: QUEST_INVITATION_CANCELLED
Item.Description: Aufforderung die Quest zu erfüllen abgelehnt

Item.Name: QUEST_NO_SPACE
Item.Description: Bei Belohnungsübergabe ist kein Platz für die Belohnung

Item.Name: QUEST_DECISION_FAILED
Item.Description: Called when a quest was failed because the player has decided to help the other player

Item.Name: TRADING_MENU_NOWARES
Item.Description: Called when the trading menu was opened but the thirdparty offers no wares

Item.Name: UNITS_IN_INFLUENCE
Item.Description: Units from executer are in the influence of the passive player. The strength of units needed to trigger this message can be configured in ProfileBalancing.UnitsInInfluceneMinStrength

Item.Name: TREATY_DISSOLVED_TRIBUTE
Item.Description: Vertrag wird aufgelöst wenn man die Tributforderung nicht zahlt

Item.Name: TALK_ABOUT_CHARACTER
Item.Description: CSP redet über einen bestimmten Charakter

Item.Name: SHIPBOARD_FINISHED
Item.Description: A player has boarded a ship

Item.Name: SHIPBOARD_STEAL
Item.Description: Player has stolen goods using the shipboard action

Item.Name: SELLSHIP_INVITATION
Item.Description: Angebot, dass man ein Schiff verkaufen soll

Item.Name: BUYSHIP_ACCEPTED
Item.Description: Einladung ein Schiff zu kaufen angenommen

Item.Name: BUYSHIP_CANCELLED
Item.Description: Einladung ein Schiff zu kaufen abgelehnt

Item.Name: UNIT_KILLED
Item.Description: A unit was killed by the executor. When an object is set in the message it will only be triggered if the specified unit was killed.

Item.Name: QUEST_FINISHED_PROFILE
Item.Description: Eine Quest wurde für einen bestimmten Charakter erledigt

Item.Name: ESCORTQUEST_INVITATION_ACCEPTED
Item.Description: Einladung zum Start der Eskort-Quest angenommen

Item.Name: ESCORTQUEST_INVITATION_DENIED
Item.Description: Einladung zum Start der Eskort-Quest abgelehnt

Item.Name: ISCRAZY
Item.Description: Kriegserklärung der KI wenn sie sich extrem stark fühlt

Item.Name: WAR_WITH_RIVAL
Item.Description: Player has war with a rival of the thirdparty

Item.Name: WAR_WITH_FRIEND
Item.Description: Player has war with a friend of the thirdparty

Item.Name: PEACE_WITH_RIVAL
Item.Description: Ein Friedens-Vertrag mit einem Rivalen wurde geschlossen

Item.Name: PEACE_WITH_FRIEND
Item.Description: Ein Friedens-Vertrag mit einem Freund wurde geschlossen

Item.Name: QUEST_FINISHED_RIVAL
Item.Description: A quest from a rival of the thirdparty was solved

Item.Name: QUEST_FINISHED_FRIEND
Item.Description: A quest from a friend of the thirdparty was solved

Item.Name: QUEST_STATION_FINISHED
Item.Description: finished a station in a trading race

Item.Name: QUEST_RACE_BEFORE
Item.Description: The AI opponent of the trading race quest has finished a station and is before the player

Item.Name: QUEST_RACE_BEHIND
Item.Description: The AI opponent of the trading race quest has finished a station and is behind the player

Item.Name: QUEST_RACE_START
Item.Description: The trading race quest has started

Item.Name: DIPLOMACYACTION_FAILED
Item.Description: The execution of a diplomacy action has failed.

Item.Name: DIPLOMACYACTION_CANCELLED
Item.Description: The player has cancelled the invitation to start a diplomacy action

Item.Name: DIPLOMACYACTION_INVITATION
Item.Description: question if the player wants to start the diplomacy action with information about the cost

Item.Name: DIPLOMACYACTION_ACTIVATED
Item.Description: Diplomacy action used which was activated before

Item.Name: DIPLOMACYACTION_SECOND_INVITATION
Item.Description: second step invitation for diplomacy actions with a second step

Item.Name: DIPLOMACYACTION_CONFIRMATION
Item.Description: Confirmation message with all infos about the selected options for the current diplomacy action. Asks if the player wants to execute it

Item.Name: DIPLOMACYACTION_OFFERED
Item.Description: Another player wants to execute a diplomacy action and asks the other player if he accepts it

Item.Name: DIPLOMACYACTION_FORCED
Item.Description: A diplomacy acrion was forced by another player by paying some resources

Item.Name: DIPLOMACYACTION_ACCEPTED
Item.Description: A player has accepted an offer to execute a diplomacy action

Item.Name: DIPLOMACYACTION_DENIED
Item.Description: A player has denied an offer to execute a diplomacy action

Item.Name: DIPLOMACYACTION_ENDED
Item.Description: Called when a diplomacy action has ended. Only needed for actions with a duration

Item.Name: PLAYEROBJECT_SELECTED
Item.Description: Called when an object this profile owns was selected

Item.Name: OBJECT_SELECTED
Item.Description: Called when the player has selected an object.

Item.Name: QUEST_SMUGGLE_START
Item.Description: message triggered when the player has got the wares he needs to smuggle

Item.Name: QUEST_SMUGGLE_INVITATION_STARTED
Item.Description: question where the player may choose to start the smuggle quest now

Item.Name: QUEST_SMUGGLE_INVITATION_CANCELLED
Item.Description: player has cancelled the invitation to start the smuggle quest

Item.Name: QUEST_LIGHTTRACKING_START
Item.Description: question where the player may choose to start the light tracking quest now

Item.Name: QUEST_LIGHTTRACKING_INVITATION_STARTED
Item.Description: player has cancelled the invitation to start the light tracking quest

Item.Name: QUEST_LIGHTTRACKING_INVITATION_CANCELLED
Item.Description: player has cancelled the invitation to start the light tracking quest

Item.Name: CHANNEL_REACTION
Item.Description: resident feedback for the channel specified in the object value

Item.Name: DISEASE_STARTED
Item.Description: the disease on an island has finished

Item.Name: DISEASE_FINISHED
Item.Description: the disease on an island has finished

Item.Name: TRIBUTE_DENIED
Item.Description: player has denied a tribute order

Item.Name: NO_TRADE
Item.Description: the player has not traded with the thirdparty while it was in the world

Item.Name: CLEANUP_STARTED
Item.Description: cleanup action from the thirdparty has started

Item.Name: CLEANUP_RUNNING
Item.Description: cleanup action from the thirdparty is running

Item.Name: CLEANUP_NOT_AVAILABLE
Item.Description: Cleanup action from the thirdparty is not available

Item.Name: CLEANUP_FINISHED
Item.Description: cleanup action from the thirdparty has finished

Item.Name: FRIEND_ATTACKED
Item.Description: A player has attacked a friend of the thirdparty

Item.Name: RIVAL_ATTACKED
Item.Description: A player has attacked a rival of the thirdparty

Item.Name: BUILDINGS_CREATED_POSITIVE
Item.Description: called when the player has created some buildings(triggered by a quest)

Item.Name: BUILDINGS_DEMOLISHED
Item.Description: called when the player has demolished some buildings(triggered by a quest)

Item.Name: MONUMENT_INVITATION_ACCEPTED
Item.Description: comment when starting a new part

Item.Name: MONUMENT_INVITATION_CANCELLED
Item.Description: comment when not starting a new part

Item.Name: MONUMENT_NOT_BUILDING
Item.Description: select a started monument part without buildmaterial

Item.Name: MONUMENT_IMPOSSIBLE
Item.Description: select a monument part with starting condition not met

Item.Name: QUEST_BOARDERS_DENIED
Item.Description: The player has denied the invitation to get the boarders item for the board a ship quest

Item.Name: QUEST_BOARDERS_INVITATION
Item.Description: Asks the player if he wants to get the boarder item for the board a ship quest

Item.Name: QUEST_BOARDERS_GOT
Item.Description: Called when the player has got the boarders for the board a ship quest

Item.Name: BOARDINGFEE_INVITATION
Item.Description: invitation to pay money to prevent the boarding of a ship

Item.Name: UNIT_KILLED_FRIEND
Item.Description: The player has killed a unit of a rival

Item.Name: UNIT_KILLED_RIVAL
Item.Description: The player has killed a unit of a friend

Item.Name: OWNING_OBJECT_SELECTED
Item.Description: The player has selected one of his own objects

Item.Name: WARQUEST_IMPOSSIBLE
Item.Description: the AI could not a start a status quest because of the diplomatic immunity

Item.Name: ISLAND_DESTROYED
Item.Description: The executor has destroyed the last building of an island

Item.Name: ASK_FOR_EXPANSION
Item.Description: a player asks if he may expand

Item.Name: EXPANSION_ALLOWED
Item.Description: The player has allowed another player to expand

Item.Name: EXPANSION_DENIED
Item.Description: The player has denied another player to expand

Item.Name: ITEM_BOUGHT
Item.Description: The executor has bought an item

Item.Name: ITEM_SOLD
Item.Description: The executor has sold an item

Item.Name: OIL_TRADED
Item.Description: the executor has traded with oil, raw oil or kerosene

Item.Name: OIL_TRADED_OTHER_PLAYER
Item.Description: The executor has traded oil, raw oil or kerosene with another player

Item.Name: DISASTER_STARTED
Item.Description: A disaster was started for the active player

Item.Name: OBJECT_DESTROYED
Item.Description: The active player has destroyed an object of the passive player

Item.Name: OBJECT_DEMOLISHED
Item.Description: The executer has demolished an object he owns

Item.Name: QUEST_GUIDINGESCORT_ITEM_INVITATION
